name: Amazing Time Ticket
text:
Pay 800 LP; apply this effect, depending on whose turn it is.
? Your turn: Add 1 "Amazement" card from your Deck to your hand.
? Your opponent's turn: Set 1 "?ttraction" Trap directly from your Deck to your Spell & Trap Zone. It can be activated this turn.
You can only activate 1 "Amazing Time Ticket" per turn.
